content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: variable_name
      operator: not_matches_regex
      value: ^[A-Z]*$
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.30
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when variable name is not in uppercase
Outcome:
  Message: Variable name must be in uppercase
Rule Type: Variable Metadata Check
Sensitivity: Variable
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '30'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Variable names should be represented in uppercase.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: 4.2.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when variable name is not in uppercase

Outcome.Message: Variable name must be in uppercase

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Variable names should be represented in uppercase.
